string-array.name: rn_note_content
string-array.item:
New BJUT Login App arrived with new packages! 
 General:
 - Add help feature.
 - Add note CardView.
 - Add release note.
 Optimized:
 - Change packages.
 - Redesign menu in MainActivity.
 Further Plan:
 - Get Network status
 - Easter Eggs
 - ......

The second Stable Version!
 General:
 - Add Status CardView! Now you can check used flux in the CardView!
 - Add Time, Fee status on CardView.
 - Add more Regular Expressions for Time, Fee.
 Optimized:
 - Optimize packages.
 - Delete Operator(Move its code to the new StatusCard).
 - Change Theme colors.
 Further Plan:
 - Help Screen
 - Get Network status
 - Easter Eggs
 - ......

The first Stable Version! 
Thanks for all people who help test this App!
 General:
 - The standard function: login and logout bjut_wifi.
 - Add permissions and sync function.
 - Add Operator for login, sync and logout.
 Further Plan:
 - Help View
 - Status Card
 - ......
